verbose_text: A ratiometric qRT-PCR assay was carried out to determine the levels of Notch1 expressed from the 5 ' transcriptional start site (5 ' TSS; full length, containing exons 1-34) and the intragenic transcriptional start site (3 ' TSS; containing exons 25-34), which is expected to generate a ligand independent form of NOTCH1 in ' type 1 ' deletions.
